Name: Roast Turkey (PH)
Description: It looks like enough to feed a family!

DescriptionLocalization.es: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Er sieht aus, als könnte er eine ganze Familie ernähren!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.hu: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.it: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.pt: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Судя по всему, ее хватит, чтобы накормить целую семью!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: It looks like enough to feed a family!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 看起来足够一家人吃了!
